reviewText:
I can not recommend this game to anyone
Reasons you should avoid it:
Boring Gameplay
Poor Options
Poor Controls (See Descriptions)
1. Boring Gameplay
The gameplay mostly consisted of driving a difficult to control truck around fairly empty highway. I never got a chance to try the other two gamemodes as I wasn't able to force myself to play that far.

2. Poor Options
There are a total of 5 different resolutions for this game, ranging from 640x480 to 1366x768. There is no 1080p or options for other aspect ratios. Other settings include a blanket texture quality option (Low Medium High) and shadow quality. Oh, and one last thing; the only time you can change any options is before the game has started. There are no in-game options at all.

3. Poor Controls
It might be better with a controller, but with a keyboard it seemed like the second I hit the arrow keys (Yes, there is no support for WASD) my truck would jerk in that direction. This coupled with the poor performance made it quite difficult to actually complete any levels
